TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EditableDesignerRegion extends System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion

summary.span: 表示關聯控制項之設計階段標記內的可編輯內容區域。

span.span: Represents an editable content region within the design-time markup for the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用類別，以協助您管理在設計階段範本。Use the class to help manage templates at design time. A會使用與這個類別的執行個體其產生的區域內容的 HTML 標記的方法。A will use an instance of this class with its method to generate HTML markup of the region's content. ## Examples 這個範例示範如何建立具有兩個可點選區域的控制項和具有兩個檢視或範本物件。This example shows how to create a control with two clickable regions and an object with two views, or templates. 編譯專案，然後在視覺化設計工具中開啟頁面，再切換至設計檢視 (WYSIWYG)。Compile the project, then open the page in a visual designer and switch to design (WYSIWYG) view. 有兩種可點按的檢視， **View1**和**View2**。There are two clickable views, **View1** and **View2**. 按一下**View1**拖曳控制項可點選區域的正下方的空白設計工具區域至頁面的下半部。Click **View1** and drag the control from the lower part of the page into the empty designer region just below the clickable regions. 按一下**View2**拖曳控制項插入空的設計工具區域。Click **View2** and drag the control into the empty designer region. 按一下**View1**同樣地，和與地區隨即再度出現。Click **View1** again, and the region with the reappears. 按一下**View2**和區域與隨即再度出現。Click **View2** and the region with the reappears. 切換回原始碼 檢視以查看您的變更保存的 HTML 標記中的方式Switch back to source view to see how your changes are persisted in the HTML markup > [!NOTE] > 您的專案必須已 System.Design.dll 組件的參考。Your project must have a reference to the System.Design.dll assembly. [!code-csharp[SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner/CS/SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner/VB/SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner.vb#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner/CS/SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner.aspx#8)] [!code-aspx-vb[SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner/VB/SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner.aspx#8)]
